name: LAX Goalie
description:
LAX Goalie

Experience the thrill of being a lacrosse goaltender in first-person with this game. Put your reflexes to the test as you attempt to save shots from a variety of angles. Halt the powerful step down shot or shut down the opposition's attack by anticipating their deceptive moves around the cage.

This game is based on the goalie mode of the leading lacrosse virtual reality game, LAX VR, which is available on Meta Quest.  More information can be found on https://laxvr.com
